item.title: Mentioned by MetroNews Canada
item.description:
Mulcair picks up two MP endorsements in NDP bid
Speaking to reporters today in Montreal, Eve Peclet and Paulina Ayala became the latest Quebec MPs to back Mulcair's campaign. Mulcair is one of eight candidates vying for the party leadership. Peclet says Mulcair will best defend the French language ...

item.title: Mentioned by Toronto Star
item.description:
